attributes.action: Raise the free school meals allowance in high schools or force high schools to lower there prices
attributes.additional_details:
Along with many parents I have a child in high school entilted to free school meals the allowance does not cover his food, I find myself putting £1-£1.50 per day onto their cashless card to cover the meal.

There are times when I can't afford that and I tell my child to take a sandwich. Which is defeating the point of free school meals providing a child with a hot meal.

HIgh school prices should be similar to primary school prices.
